Style with orange/maroon Tailwind classes and position:sticky

requirements.summary: Build Home page with hero banner (animated SVG medical graphics), phone number, 3 CTA buttons, 4 service cards, testimonials, and newsletter signup
acceptanceCriteria: Hero SVG animations play on mount using Framer Motion
Phone number 9931918438 is visible and clickable
All 3 CTA buttons link to their correct targets
4 service cards display with icons and route correctly
3 testimonial quotes are displayed
Newsletter input submits and shows a success message without page reload

file_operations.description: Replace skeleton with full Home page: (1) Hero banner section with animated SVG graphics (floating pills, stethoscope icon, heartbeat line using stroke-dasharray/stroke-dashoffset animated via Framer Motion) and introductory text emphasizing quality healthcare. (2) Display phone number 9931918438 prominently (clickable tel: link). (3) Three CTA buttons: 'Book Now' (React Router Link to /pathology), 'Contact Us' (<a href='tel:9931918438'>), 'Order Medicine' (Link to /medicine). (4) Four service cards (Medicine, Pathology, Ultrasound, Doctor Consultation) each with a Lucide React icon and Link to the corresponding page. (5) Testimonials section with 3 patient quotes hard-coded. (6) Newsletter signup form with controlled email input state and a submit handler that prevents default, sets a success message state, and clears the input

requirements.summary: Build Medicine Services page with animated hero, 'Free Delivery' badge, medicine request form, and animated delivery process steps
acceptanceCriteria: Hero animations play on page load
'Free Delivery within 20 km' badge has a visible pulse animation
All 6 form fields are present and controlled via React state
Submitting the form shows a success message and clears/disables the form
Delivery process steps animate sequentially with Framer Motion

file_operations.description: Replace skeleton with full Medicine Services page: (1) Hero section with animated delivery truck and pill SVG/Lucide icons using Framer Motion. (2) Service description with an animated pulsing badge reading 'Free Delivery within 20 km' (Framer Motion scale pulse). (3) Medicine request form with 6 controlled fields: Name (text), Contact Number (tel), Address (textarea), Medicine Name (text), Prescription Upload (file input), Preferred Delivery Time (time or select). On submit, preventDefault, show success confirmation message, clear form state. (4) Animated delivery process steps section showing icons with connecting arrows (Order → Verify → Pack → Deliver) animated sequentially with Framer Motion staggerChildren/transition delays
